text:
🚴Punggol Promenade Nature Walk lies between Punggol Promenade Punggol Point Walk and Punggol Promenade Riverside Walk.
🏃👫🚴This scenic path along the Serangoon Reservior water edge offers cyclist, hikers and joggers alike, a leisure tranquil retreat.
⛺🎣🪧It features Fishing Decks, Lookout, Rest Shelter and Footbridges

Excellent place to do bird watching. They are:
Asian Openbill Stork
Longtailed Shrike
Kingfisher

Spotted snake too.

(1) Punggol Promenade/Punggol Point Walk, (2) Coney Island, and (3) Lor Halus Red Bridge/Punggol Promenade Nature Walk are all next to one another. After being at (1) Punggol Promenade/Punggol Point Walk the week before, the target this time would be (2) Coney Island and (3) Lor Halus Red Bridge/Punggol Promenade Nature Walk.

a very beautiful place for a walk, for cycling and for exercise as well. one little shortfall, the same pathway is shared among pedestrian, runner and biker. if you are going for biking, will need to beware of other users, especially the kids who are running around. There's some restaurants nearby, would be nice to end the walk with a seafood dinner around. good place for some family time.
A nice place to enjoy the sea breeze and nature with tranquility.
